name: Ultimate Bot Arena
description:
Be the Ultimate Champion!

Play with your friends in this multiplayer arena shooter, tribute to the game made by the famous youtuber.

7 weapons at the same time, life and armor system, fast movements and many (but really many) bugs!

Create a room, call your friends and start shooting!

// --------------------------------------------------------

I rushed the game in 5 days, it's my first multiplayer project, so there are likely to be quite a few issues with this one.

The game was made solely by me, but all the graphic assets are external.

To play, simply create a room and enter players, or find an existing game. Being a prototype game and based on multiplayer, to play you can write a comment and I will try to participate.

- KNOWN BUGS -

* The final scoreboard marks the victory to the wrong player and does not update the points correctly;

* The scoreboard as soon as you start the game shows the previous score;

* Clipping issues with some objects

- CREDITS -
